title: Shawn Messenger Fine Art Glass Red Roses Paperweight
description:
This magnificent glass paperweight captures red roses floating on a layer of glistening dichroic glass.  Flowers and bubbles are swirled together to create a world of exciting movement.  Due to the handcrafted nature of this product size and color will vary slightly.  Signed by the artist and made in the USA.  Glass paperweights can be found in the museum's permanent collection.

3 1/4 in.  x 3 1/4 in.

1.5 lbs.
